verbs.description: Cities across the country [V: are] turning down the opportunity to host the 2020 Republican National Convention , where President Trump is expected to be nominated for a second term . The cities that have rejected hosting duties insist Trump and the today 's divisive politics are not factors in their decisions . They instead cite high security costs and disruptions in the normal flow of business and traffic . But Trump is almost certainly a ...
